detail_desc: Socks in a soft, fine, fluffy knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated at the top.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Imitation suede jacket with a soft faux fur lining and a faux fur collar with a tab and metal buckle. Zip down the front, side pockets and faux fur cuffs.
Hairband with pierced metal leaf decorations at the front and elastic at the back.
Court shoes with round toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Round, covered heels 9 cm.
Crushed velvet ankle boots with pointed toes and a soft shaft. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9.5 cm.
Long-sleeved, round-neck dress in soft fabric with an opening and decorative bow at the back of the neck, and a seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Bodice and skirt lined with jersey.
Smart trousers in a stretch weave with two press-studs at the waist and a zip fly. Zipped front pockets, jetted back pockets and slim, straight legs.
Trousers in a jacquard weave with a high waist with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in a crêpe weave with a concealed zip in the side and straight legs with creases.
Top in a cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Straight cut at the top with a foldover edge, a wide tie at the waist and a rounded hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Microfibre with laser-cut edges, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Corset in lace and mesh with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and suspenders. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave. Jersey inner skirt.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave. Jersey inner skirt.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave. Jersey inner skirt.
Fitted jacket in a pinstriped weave with notch lapels, a button at the front, welt front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Coat in sturdy, felted fabric with notch lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front, patch pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.

Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a lined hood, stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets and flap patch pockets with press-studs. Partly lined.
Double-breasted coat in woven fabric containing some wool with a soft brushed finish. Notch lapels, side pockets, a detachable tie best at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar, short frilled sleeves and frills front and back. The frills have an overlocked edge in a contrasting colour. Smocking at the top of the front and an opening down the back with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a decorative satin knot bow, zip at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size approx. 4x13x16 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish and no buttons.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish and no buttons.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 65 cm, circumference 166 cm.
Hat in a soft, sturdy rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top.
Fine-knit cotton dress with short sleeves.
Fine-knit cotton dress with short sleeves.
Short satin dress in a narrow cut at the top with gathers, double shoulder straps that cross at the back, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Pleated halterneck dress in a double layer of chiffon in a narrow cut at the top with a tie and a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck and narrow elastication at the back. Lined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

One-button jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Sleeveless body in jersey containing glittery threads. Deep V-neck at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Straight-cut V-neck dress in a crêpe weave. Small stand-up collar, pleats at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Straight-cut V-neck dress in a crêpe weave. Small stand-up collar, pleats at the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Body in flock-print mesh with shoulder straps, a low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with short raglan sleeves with gathers.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with short raglan sleeves with gathers.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in a woven fabric with decorative pleats on the shoulders, short sleeves, a wrapover front and wide tie at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length, dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and gentle drape. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring, and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length, dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and gentle drape. 3/4-length sleeves with a drawstring, and a flare to the hem. Unlined.
Short-sleeved, short lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a wrapover front with a tie at one side and concealed buttons at the other and long sleeves with cuffs. Unlined.
One-shoulder dress in an airy weave with a metallic coating. One long, wide sleeve with a buttoned cuff, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Sunglasses with angular frames in tortoiseshell plastic with tinted UV-protective lenses.
Glasses with plastic frames and clear lenses.

Microfibre bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and three pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Top in linen jersey with a deep V-neck and short cap sleeves.
Silk kimono with dropped shoulders, wide 3/4-length sleeves with a contrasting colour trim at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and rounded hem.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top with an elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Yoga socks in jersey with mesh fronts and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Short kimono in satin crêpe with short butterfly sleeves and an overlocked frill trim at the cuffs and hem. Tie belt at the waist and a concealed tie on the inside.
Wrapover off-the-shoulder dress in a viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and a tie at the side. Unlined.
Hairband of hole-patterned metal discs with elastic at the back of the neck.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, chest pockets and appliqués. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a tie-front hem.
Thin, textured metal earrings in various sizes and designs.
Tube scarf in patterned jersey that can also be used as a headband. Length 45 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Tube scarf in patterned jersey that can also be used as a headband. Length 45 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Outdoor jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front and side pockets with a contrasting colour zip. Long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Gently flared top in a patterned weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Short blouse in smocked viscose with 3/4-length sleeves and a frill trim around the top and cuffs.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable waist with a press-stud, fake fly, side pockets and a fake back pocket.
V-neck blouse in a striped cotton weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and tie at the back. Low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and fasteners at the cuffs.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted top in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Wide top in cotton jersey with embroidery at the top and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Single-button tuxedo jacket in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a satin shawl collar, button at the cuffs, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and two inner pockets. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Non-padded bras in lace with underwired, mesh-lined cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
